General.Name: Sungdo Engineering & Construction Co. Ltd
General.Description: Sungdo Engineering & Construction Co., Ltd. constructs industrial facilities and plants in South Korea and internationally. The company engages in the general construction business, including the civil engineering, construction, and real estate development of industrial facility plants, general buildings, housings, bio-pharm plants, food factories, frozen food warehouses, and turnkey projects. It is also involved in the design, engineering, procurement, testing, commissioning, operation, maintenance, and after sales service of semiconductor and display, solar cell of module, biotechnology and pharmaceutical, secondary cell, and building mechanical projects. In addition, the company engages in the installation of piping facilities and equipment for refinery, power, gas facility, petro chemical, and environmental conservation plants. Further, it develops, leases, manages, and sells real estate properties. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Sungdo Venture Tower, Seoul, South Korea
